   sphinx-quickstart on Sun Aug 27 13:58:34 2023.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

TCutility |ProjectVersion| documentation
========================================

**TCutility** is a Python library containing many helper functions and classes for use in programs written in the TheoCheM group.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   tcutility.results
   analysis/analysis

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Extra (utility) modules are:

   tcutility.constants

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Full API:

   api/modules


Indices and tables
==================

* :ref:`genindex`
* :ref:`modindex`
* :ref:`search`


.. note::

   This library is under heavy development, so there are no guarantees that older code will work with newer versions.
